title: Question:
author: Selena-01
content: As the title state، the hashrate to power consumption ratio doesn't matter much as raw hashrate output, considering where I will set it up electricity is dirt cheap.  I looked  around but I'm no expert especially that most today are trying to advertise for the electricity efficiency.

comments.author: Jhowie69
comments.body: Please reach out, can help with s19

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: s19's are costly. over 4kyou may want an Avalon64 th at $1346 is 21 usd a th it is not good with power 3400 watts and 64 th is 53 watts a th https://shop.canaan.io/products/avalon-miner-a1126-pro-s-64t-3420w?VariantsId=10007or https://shop.canaan.io/products/canaan-avalon-miner-a1246-87t?VariantsId=1000287 th at 3400 watts for $2743that is 31 usd a th and uses 39 watts a thkeep in mind that the s19 xp will do 21 watts a th and 140th but will cost over 9k

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on August 12, 2022, 01:51:20 PMs19's are costly. over 4kOffordscott offers $3.8k s19j pro not brand new but used units he posted it recently on his telegram here https://t.me/asicEasternHemisphereThat's the only option if you want to buy Antminer units a bit cheap compared to buying directly in Bitmain.And it seems most of the Canaan units are another option if you want cheap and brand new units.

comments.author: sanazkarma
comments.body: hi dear friendsIf you are looking for the best bitcoin miner, in my opinion, you must read the article published on the site https://zcoino.com/, it can be a good guide for you to choose the best one.

comments.author: Aio Ikari
comments.body: bitmain had the t19 of 85 th for 1500 usd like 1 week ago.avalon miner has ok deals but if values of crypto keep crashing you will also see the miner value decrease be patient and keep checking manufactuers

comments.author: MinerMEDIC
comments.body: From a construction standpoint the whatsminer is, in all certainty the best, designed and built using the newest and most reliable technology. So much so that now the newest revision of the S19J pro are built similarly But are still inferior because they refuse to retire their proprietary ASIC pad design for a more industry standard one. The only thing that really ever goes out on these is the power supply.
